Original: You intend to accept this request?
It is from the Guildmaster himself.
[Page]
Have you heard the rumor of the [Color:5]fog[Color:0]
monster that appears on [Color:5]B1F[Color:0] of the
[Color:5]Misty Ravine[Color:0]?
[Page]
The rumor has many people scared, and
so the Guildmaster wants you to unmask
this fog monster's true identity.
[Page]
Reports say it appears between [Color:5]7 and
9 in the morning[Color:0]. You might learn
more by asking the Guildmaster.
[Page]
Be careful... I have misgivings about
this one. I await your swift return
to collect the reward.
Translation: You intend to accept this request?
It is from the Guildmaster himself.
[Page]
Have you heard the rumor of the [Color:5]fog[Color:0]
monster that appears on [Color:5]B1F[Color:0] of the
[Color:5]Misty Ravine[Color:0]?
[Page]
The rumor has many people scared, and
so the Guildmaster wants you to unmask
this fog monster's true identity.
[Page]
Reports say it appears between [Color:5]7 and
9 in the morning[Color:0]. You might learn
more by asking the Guildmaster.
[Page]
Be careful... I have misgivings about
this one. I await your swift return
to collect the reward.

Original: Welcome back. I am very glad to see
that you are with us safely again.
I was worried.
[Page]
But you seem to be taking it all in
stride. Let me see this report...
[Page]
What!? The "fog monster" was nothing
but a natural phenomenon!? Then I
was worried for nothing.
[Page]
It seems this dread was all simply
fear of the unknown...
[Page]
Oh yes, the Guildmaster mentioned one
more reward he wanted to give you
directly at the [Color:5]Explorers Guild[Color:0].
Translation: Welcome back. I am very glad to see
that you are with us safely again.
I was worried.
[Page]
But you seem to be taking it all in
stride. Let me see this report...
[Page]
What!? The "fog monster" was nothing
but a natural phenomenon!? Then I
was worried for nothing.
[Page]
It seems this dread was all simply
fear of the unknown...
[Page]
Oh yes, the Guildmaster mentioned one
more reward he wanted to give you
directly at the [Color:5]Explorers Guild[Color:0].

Original: The [Color:5]Misty Ravine[Color:0] fog monster? Not you
too... I don't know what it is, but
you can get through by--
[Page]
What? You're going to defeat it? Oh,
it was you who accepted my request?
Haha, why didn't you say so?
[Page]
All I've heard says this monster shows
up from [Color:5]7 to 9 in the morning[Color:0] at the
[Color:5]eastern dead end[Color:0].
[Page]
Now hurry up and get going. I'll be
waiting for you to come back with that
monster's head as a gift.
Translation: The [Color:5]Misty Ravine[Color:0] fog monster? Not you
too... I don't know what it is, but
you can get through by--
[Page]
What? You're going to defeat it? Oh,
it was you who accepted my request?
Haha, why didn't you say so?
[Page]
All I've heard says this monster shows
up from [Color:5]7 to 9 in the morning[Color:0] at the
[Color:5]eastern dead end[Color:0].
[Page]
Now hurry up and get going. I'll be
waiting for you to come back with that
monster's head as a gift.

Original: The monster's been seen from [Color:5]7 to 9
in the morning[Color:0], usually at the dead
end on B1F of the Misty Ravine.
Translation: The monster's been seen from [Color:5]7 to 9
in the morning[Color:0], usually at the dead
end on B1F of the Misty Ravine.

Original: You made it back. So, how was your
thrilling encounter with the fog
monster?
[Page]
What? It was just a trick of nature?
Heh, sounds like you dodged a bullet.
But that's the labyrinth for you.
[Page]
No need to feel down, though. It was
your courage and curiosity that
"killed" the ghost.
Translation: You made it back. So, how was your
thrilling encounter with the fog
monster?
[Page]
What? It was just a trick of nature?
Heh, sounds like you dodged a bullet.
But that's the labyrinth for you.
[Page]
No need to feel down, though. It was
your courage and curiosity that
"killed" the ghost.

Original: As you walk down the path covered in
morning mist, you notice something
strange at the far end.
[Page]
In the thick fog stands a large,
shadowy figure with seven colored
rings!
[Page]
This shadowy thing must be the fog
monster you have heard rumors of...
[Page]
But you do not detect any threat from
the shadow. It merely stands before
you ominously.
[Page]
If you mean to fulfill the request,
you must shake off your fear and
approach the monster.
Translation: As you walk down the path covered in
morning mist, you notice something
strange at the far end.
[Page]
In the thick fog stands a large,
shadowy figure with seven colored
rings!
[Page]
This shadowy thing must be the fog
monster you have heard rumors of...
[Page]
But you do not detect any threat from
the shadow. It merely stands before
you ominously.
[Page]
If you mean to fulfill the request,
you must shake off your fear and
approach the monster.

Original: After screwing up your courage and
closing in on the shadow, you learn
the astonishing truth!
[Page]
The shadow is no monster at all!
It is the light piercing the fog,
casting shadows of yourselves!
[Page]
After breathing a sigh of relief to
know the truth, you begin to write
down your account of the phenomenon.
[Page]
With the request complete, you laugh
at how frightened you were only
minutes previous and then leave.
Translation: After screwing up your courage and
closing in on the shadow, you learn
the astonishing truth!
[Page]
The shadow is no monster at all!
It is the light piercing the fog,
casting shadows of yourselves!
[Page]
After breathing a sigh of relief to
know the truth, you begin to write
down your account of the phenomenon.
[Page]
With the request complete, you laugh
at how frightened you were only
minutes previous and then leave.

Original: You arrive at the dead end where a
light fog covers the greenery.
[Page]
You wouldn't mind taking a break here,
where the air is filled with a spring
green scent.
Translation: You arrive at the dead end where a
light fog covers the greenery.
[Page]
You wouldn't mind taking a break here,
where the air is filled with a spring
green scent.

Original: [Color:5]Take a deep breath?[Color:0]
Translation: [Color:5]Take a deep breath?[Color:0]

Original: After inhaling the fresh air, you
resume your journey with lightened
steps.
Translation: After inhaling the fresh air, you
resume your journey with lightened
steps.

Original: [Color:3]The party recovers 10 TP.[Color:0]
Translation: [Color:3]The party recovers 10 TP.[Color:0]

Original: You leave the area and continue with
your explorations.
Translation: You leave the area and continue with
your explorations.
